attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. it took FOREVER to download. I started downloading it at 8am and it finally finished downloading almost 12 hours later. Once it finished downloading my phone spontaneously combusted in my hand and now i have to get surgery that my insurance wont cover and now i have to pay a whopping $12,000 to get my hand surgery. I have no idea why anyone would vote for this inconsiderate, racist, disgusting and cruel man.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is Literally terrible it almost took a whole day to download every time I open the app it was glitched back to my home screen one of the worst apps Iâ€™ve ever downloaded the app only worked about about once or twice and I have a perfectly good Wi-Fi service and the times it did work my whole phone was the switch to a orange screen is the absolutely horrible app DO NOT download
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app all my information was leaked to hackers and now I have to shut down my phone because of all the viruses Iâ€™m getting! I couldâ€™ve saved hundred of dollars if I hadnâ€™t downloaded this app, but now I have to get a new phone because this app is not protecting my safety! This app should be shut down IMMEDIATELY I canâ€™t believe itâ€™s even in the app store.
attributes.title: My phone got HACKED because of this app!

attributes.review: This app is terrible. It promotes things that have no place in this country. I cannot believe that this is even allowed to be on the App Store. Besides all the bad things it supports itâ€™s also extremely glitchy and confusing and needs a couple updates to even work properly. I have never downloaded a worse app. PLS donâ€™t download.
attributes.title: If I could rate this any worse I would.

attributes.title: horrible app!!

attributes.review: This took 3 hours to download!! And as soon as I got in the app my phone starting glitching. When I was trying to look at some stuff in the app it would kick me out and it happened every single time I tried. I even tried deleting and reinstalling the app and the same thing kept happening as if the app was about to crash. Will never download again.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I was extremely disappointed by this app. I did not expect this app to have a) a background of a naked Melania AND Donald together b) have all the sections in what seems to be Chinese, c) it seems to have leaked government documents that will randomly pop up? d) a copy of Barack Obamaâ€™s birth certificate and e) it left a weird bug on my phone where whenever Siri picks up the word, â€œTrumpâ€ it immediately calls 911...small price to pay for freedom tho!
attributes.title: WOAH

I now have to take my phone to the store and either purchase a new one or figure out why viruses infected my phone upon downloading!!): My phone, like this nation, was working just fine before Trump:///
attributes.title: Infected my phone with virus

attributes.review: I have tried downloading the app many times but it has stopped the download and does not complete it. After a week the app downloaded. The app has many bugs and need improvements. The creators did not take their time on this app because it is absolutely garbage F for effort. Not to mention this app has too many ads. Overall do not recommend getting this app. Joe Bidden for 2020.
